passage_text: Certified Nurse Assistant (CNA) Salary. (United States). The average pay for a Certified Nurse Assistant (CNA) is $10.99 per hour. Skills that are associated with high pay for this job are Telemetry, Operating Room / OR, Intensive Care Unit (ICU), and Emergency Room (ER

The Golden Living CNA and SRNA Training Program is a great way to get started. Hourly rates can vary, but at a glance, the annual salary for a Certified Nursing Assistant is $35,000 per year in Mississippi. This figure is 20% higher than the average CNA salary for the rest of the nation. You might even benefit from health and dental insurance and other paid benefits like vacation, disability, vision or sick leave coverage when you become a certified nursing assistant in Mississippi.

CNA Salaries. CNA Salaries. Median annual CNA salaries were about $24,420 in May 2012.
